properties.areaDesc: Northern Blue Mountains of Oregon; Northwest Blue Mountains
properties.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 8 at 10:08AM PST until February 8 at 10:00PM PST by NWS Pendleton OR
properties.description:
...WINTER STORM TO BRING SNOW TO AREA MOUNTAINS TODAY...

.A winter storm will move across the region today. A cold front
will lower snow levels leading to significant accumulations for
the Washington Cascades and Blue Mountains.

* WHAT...Snow. The snow will be heavy at times. Total snow
accumulation will range from 6 to 12 inches.

* WHERE...In Washington, Northwest Blue Mountains. In Oregon,
Northern Blue Mountains.

* WHEN...Until 10 PM PST this evening.

* IMPACTS...Travel will be very difficult. Especially along
interstate 84 through the Meacham area. Gusty winds will
create drifting and blowing of snow reducing visibilities at
times.
properties.instruction:
If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in
your vehicle in case of an emergency.

Stay tuned to NOAA weather radio...social media for additional
updates.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM PST THIS EVENING
